text: Christine Cicot (born 10 September 1964 in Libourne, Gironde) is a French judoka, Olympic medalist and world champion. She received a bronze medal in the heavyweight (+72 kg) division at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta. She became world champion in Paris 1997. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:People from Libourne Category:French female judoka Category:Olympic judoka of France Category:Judoka at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Judoka at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in judo Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gironde
title: Christine Cicot
